name: Hydro Samachurl
description:
A wizened, mumbling hilichurl, one that chants of the power of Hydro.
Hilichurls especially gifted in commanding the elements who often reach the zenith of their skill in their twilight years. What sort of life would lead to such simple creatures being able to summon water and rains?

investigation.name: Samachurl
investigation.description: Shamans of the hilichurl tribes. They display a limited ability to harness elemental energy.\n"While their masks are made with the intent of instilling fear in their enemies, their designs come across as more charming than frightening." â€” Jacob Musk
